name: Agency of Broken Hearts (or, Heart Fixers)
name_original: Agency of Broken Hearts (or, Heart Fixers)
description:
A short visual novel style game about repairing the broken hearts of people lost in life. Will you be able to make a difference and help them? 

Game developed for the Global Game Jam 2020.

Credits

Luis León - Game design, writing and art

Mariano Ramírez - Game design and programming

Eduardo González (had to leave) - Additional design and art
